title: Rolling power interruption schedule for today
body_lines: Rolling power interruptions of 6 hours and 30 minutes will continue today (April 06), as scheduled by the Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL).
On Monday (April 04), the PUCSL approved the Ceylon Electricity Board’s request for power cuts for four days (from April 05 to 08), due to the limited supply of fuel for thermal power plants.
